entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a character with a sneer on his face and a waspish voice. He is mentioned to be sent by Dumbledore.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is introduced as Sirius's godfather. Snape mentions that Black likes to feel involved.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is introduced as Black's godfather and a character who lets his chair fall back onto all four legs with a loud bang when he gets frustrated.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned to have sent Snape to tell Harry that he wants him to study Occlumency this term.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person who is supposed to see Snape alone and is told by Snape that Dumbledore wants him to study Occlumency this term.

relationships.description: Snape dislikes Black, as evident from his tone and words when talking about Black.
Dumbledore has ordered Snape to tell Harry that he wants him to study Occlumency this term.
Snape dislikes Sirius, as evident from his tone and words when talking about Sirius.
